nodes.text: Lonaste was a female Ugnaught miner who lived in Ugnaught Town on Bespin during the Galactic Civil War. From the intercepted messages and warnings, she concluded that the Empire would take control of the city. She want to warn the Ugnaught clan's but they didn't belived her.When the Imperials arrived and they began take control of the city, they want to escape. She and her cousin Beetase went to the platforms to find a spaceship. But Yoxgit want to shot them, because he agreed with the Empire to supply them miners and he thought about Lonaste's clan. Before he can did it, one of Lonaste's aunt hit him unconscious and they can live the planet.
